Text:
Thanks! 

But, Bold & Delicious isn't hideous!!! One of the best song after my opinion... 

And yes, Ayu is awesome, one of the most prolific and influential Japanese pop singers in Japanese music history, and she is dubbed "the Empress of J-Pop".

The video for B&D: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GJxT4PBI3k8

I apologize for being unable to seed at the moment, but my internet is faulty on the computer I download with, and I haven't set up the other computer for it yet..

I'll be uploading my J-collection soon, in bits and pieces, so be expectant!
